resources.string: A&J was founded by Jacob Greenberg and Amanda Condron to give customers the feeling of convenience when shopping for their favorite styles. With easy access to designer clothes at the tap of a button, what more could a fashionista want! Our exquisite lines of designer clothes is one of a kind and tailored to the customers needs. One of our newest additions to the line is “Camel Pants”, which have been in high demand with celebrities that shop at our site. The authentic camel leather is imported directly to our stores and made by hand in store. All items are carefully made to meet out consumers satisfaction and are of the highest quality of authentic materials. Our striking line of designer clothes are manufactured ethically and with the newest technology, helping reduce the carbon footprint the clothing industry produces. A&J is a convenient, high end, and eco friendly place to shop.

This application will collect and maintain personal information provided by its users, strictly their email addresses. The information is voluntarily provided by the users to fully access the site and all of its components. This data is valuable to the company for various internal purposes, including troubleshooting and improving the site’s functionality. Returns are available, but only within a 14 day period starting the date and time of shipment. A&J is not responsible to refund customers if returns are after the 14 day window. Worldwide shipping is available. The information provided by the user on this site will be subject to the laws of the United States of America, regardless of location of ordering. A&J uses cookies and other technology to keep track of users interactions our site.
